input.sentences: there are several ways your child can have fun with painting eggs .
your child would enjoyed painting this egg by giving it different colors .
this egg has a yellow cross with red and white colors .
here is an egg with a girl with brown hair | white blouse and pink dress .
let your child explore their skills .
output.sentences: Painting eggs is so much fun!
My family and I enjoy giving our painted eggs to friends.
Johnny painted a yellow cross on his egg with red and white dots.
Mary painted a white and pink princess on hers, with pretty long hair.
My youngest child loved to explore the different color combinations skills he could  paint.
